p: The Sg-CN catalyst was characterized using scanning electron microscope (SEM), transmission electron microscope (TEM), X-ray diffraction (XRD), Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FT-IR), and solid-state nuclear magnetic resonance (13C-NMR). The SEM analysis clearly indicates the incorporation of sulfonic group in the graphitic carbon nitride framework; change in morphology of g-CN after sulfonation was also discerned (Fig. 2).
